Dialogue.text: I hate sand it gets in my shorts, which makes it not comfy and easy to wear.
I don't like sand. It's all coarse, and rough, and irritating. And it gets everywhere.
I heard rumours about a gallade appearing in a lava area.
I catch shiny pokemon in my gucci flip-flops.
I heard rumours about a gardevoir appearing in a lava area.
Is 'sand' called 'sand' because it is between the sea and the land?
